name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience delivering innovative solutions across healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **C#**, **Python**, **SQL**, and leveraging **AWS** for cloud deployments. Skilled in frontend technologies like **Angular**, **React**, and **Vue.js**, with hands-on experience in building data-driven applications using **PowerBI** and **Databricks**. Experienced in developing and implementing AI solutions that enhance predictive analytics and real-time processing.

Deep expertise in full stack development, incorporating microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD practices. Strong background in compliance-oriented development with respect to industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Proven ability in MLOps, including model training and orchestration using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed scalable web applications within **React** and **Angular** frameworks, ensuring optimal performance and user experience.
• Engineered robust backend services using **C#** and **Python** for seamless integration with healthcare and fintech systems.
• Leveraged **AWS** cloud services for deploying applications, achieving a **99.9% uptime** and facilitating **real-time** data processing and analytics.
• Managed relational and non-relational databases, including **SQL** and **Snowflake**, to handle an average of **5 million** transactions daily, maintaining data integrity and security.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate **PowerBI** and **Databricks** for advanced data analytics, delivering insights to stakeholders significantly faster, improving reporting speed by **30%**.
• Utilized modern frontend frameworks such as **Vue.js** to enhance user experience, contributing to an increase in user engagement by **25%**.
• Designed and implemented APIs to support seamless communication between **AI** models and frontend applications, enhancing functionality and responsiveness.
• Actively participated in code reviews and developed unit tests using **Jest** and **PyTest**, ensuring high-quality deliverables and reducing production bugs by **40%**.
• Conducted performance tuning and optimization efforts, achieving at least **50%** reduction in page load times across multiple applications.
• Engaged in agile development practices, contributing to iterative software enhancements and timely project deliveries, meeting all deadlines as scheduled.

Leveraged **C#**, **Python**, and **SQL** to modernize core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture, enhancing scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
Utilized **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript** together with **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to build interactive front-end applications for financial tools, increasing user engagement by **25%**.
Delivered real-time analytics dashboards using **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, equipping operations teams with instant insights into transactions and anomalies, contributing to a **15%** reduction in response time.
Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture with **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication across critical workflows such as payments, alerts, and compliance for over **50,000** transactions daily.
Developed ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting both batch and real-time processing, improving data accessibility by **40%**.
Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection utilizing **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns, reducing fraud incidents by **30%**.
Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services, leading to a **20%** increase in customer retention.

Designed and optimized backend services for an Order Management System (OMS) utilizing **Python** (FastAPI, Django) and C#, ensuring high availability, low latency, and scalability across key modules like checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
Engineered real-time features using WebSockets and event-driven architecture powered by **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, enabling responsive order updates, dynamic inventory tracking, and real-time customer support.
Developed frontend applications using **React** (18), **Vue.js** (3), and **Angular**, enhanced with **TypeScript**, Redux Toolkit, and Tailwind CSS, delivering fast, responsive user experiences on both web and mobile platforms.
Leveraged **SQL** with MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Redis, and Cassandra for distributed data storage, ensuring fast, fault-tolerant data access for high-traffic e-commerce workflows and caching frequently accessed resources for performance gains.
Integrated AI/ML-based recommendation engines using **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow** to personalize product listings, optimize search relevance, and improve conversion rates based on real-time behavioral data.
Implemented **Redis** caching for product metadata, shopping cart sessions, and search results, significantly improving application responsiveness and reducing read pressure on databases.
Implemented feature flags and blue-green deployments using **LaunchDarkly** and **Kubernetes** namespaces, enabling controlled rollouts, A/B testing, and risk mitigation during major platform updates.
Created responsive, SEO-friendly e-commerce UIs using **Next.js**, **Vue.js** (3), and HTML5/CSS3, optimized for mobile-first engagement and accessibility compliance (**WCAG 2.1**).
Built secure payment workflows integrated with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, applying tokenized transactions and PCI-compliant handling of sensitive data.
Applied role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** for secure customer and admin access, ensuring **GDPR** compliance and user data protection throughout the platform.
